name: Homebrew (Naelys)
description:
Make your own potion according to conditions on the left. You can collect roots in your garden with differents tools. 

You can transform your roots to change their shape and maybe fit in the potion, you can rotate the root with right clic.

Check the controls in the menu screen and have fun !

Credit to Tausdei : https://opengameart.org/content/ursus for the music !
